metadata.description: Carrying on our long-standing Canada Day tradition, The Chapterhouse 2016 Summer Special is jam-packed with short stories and previews featuring many of its new and upcoming titles- including Captain Canuck, Northguard, the Pitiful Human Lizard, Spirit Leaves, Die Kitty Die, Life, Death & Sorcery, Obsolete Heroes and The Fourth Planet.
metadata.name: Chapterhouse Summer Special
